## {{< fa briefcase >}} work


Hi! My name is Josue <small>(pronounced ho-sway)</small>. 

I’m a data scientist at McGraw Hill where I’m helping build personalized learning experiences at scale. I previously earned a PhD in Quantitative Psychology at UC Davis, where I focused on developing Bayesian statistical models for social-behavior science.
